West under-barrel grenade launcher. Allows to shoot 40mm grenades when attached.
Can be mounted on: M4, L85, FN-CAL, AUG.

East under-barrel grenade launcher. Allows to shoot VOG-25 grenades when attached.
Can be mounted on: AK-74, AKM, AN-94.
You can fill it with your own blood for later use. Requires minimum 50% blood level.

Special stone used to sharp blades. +25 durability on melee weapon when used.
Can be used on: Hatchet, Fireaxe, Sword, Katana, Knives.

Universal front grip for AK rifles. Heavily decrease maximum spread when shooting. Makes shooting on run and long shooting more efficent.
Can be used on: AK-74, AKM, RPK.

Front grip for weapons with Pic rails. Heavily decrease maximum spread when shooting. Makes shooting on run and long shooting more efficent.
Can be used on: UMP-45, M4, L85.
Small notepad, containing coordinates of interesting places on this island. If you do not use it, then it will be removed on next island.

Following you.
I will guard this area.
I cant sleep when enemies around.
I better will sleep at night.
You can sleep in the night time. If you in good condition you can sleep until morning 06:00. You will wake up earlier if hunger or thirst will be too high.

Legend
Too close!
Xavier "Pilot" Starting gear: gorka pants, sweater, pilot helmet, UMP-45, flare. Unlocked perks: Survivalist(lvl.2), Scout
Xavier "Pilot" Unlock requirement: Find 13 helicopter crash sites in one run. On "Legend" difficulty.
Rudolf "Jager" Starting gear: Izh-43, Ushanka, 12cal ammo x10, hunter knife, fishing rod, hunter jacket, hunter pants. Unlocked perks: Hunter(lvl.2), Vigilance
Rudolf "Jager" Unlock requirement: Find and kill 3 albino deers. On "Legend" difficulty.
Taman "Guard" Starting gear: Police hat, Police jacket, Police pants, AKSu-74, energy drink. Unlocked perks: Sharpshooter(lvl.2), Bullet farmer
Taman "Guard" Unlock requirement: Kill "Tank" with the machine gun mounted on HUMVEE. On "Legend" difficulty.
Greta "Scientist" Starting gear: Worker pants, apron, shirt, tetracyclin, IV kit, vitamins, adrenaline, x3 bandages. Unlocked perks: Red+ (lvl.2), Sprinter
Greta "Scientist" Unlock requirement: Reach 5 island. On "Legend" difficulty.
Sharp (+25%)
Deagle Unlock requirement: Carry a cowboy set (cowboy hat, shirt, magnum) in one run, all at once. On "Regular" or higher difficulty. Current status:
Deagle Unlocked. Locations: Underground bunkers, Gun shops.
Katana Unlock requirement: Kill 100 zombies with knives. On "Legend" difficulty. Current status:
Katana Unlocked. Locations: Gun shops.

Fishing rod is ruined.
Craft Molotov
MOLOTOV AND ROPE
Rags x3 = Rope
Whiskey + Flare = Molotov
STASH FOR LOOT
Burlap sack + Burlap sack = Canvas
Canvas + Wood piles = Build Stash. Loot dropped in stash will be safe. Enemies can destroy it if found.
Mike "Designer" Unlock requirement: Reach unknown island. On "Legend" difficulty.
Mike "Designer" Starting gear: Awesome hoodie, Worker pants, Sword, Vector, Energy Drink x4, ammo .45 ACP x60. Unlocked perks: Sharpshooter, Puncher, Sprinter, Scout.
Adhesive plaster Unlock requirement: Finish the game with one of these characters: Emilio "Doc", Maxim "Red", Dave "Boxer".
Lighter Unlock requirement: Finish the game with one of these characters: Jochi "Maniac", Sergey "Slav", Dave ยซBikerยป.
Smoke Grenade Unlock requirement: Finish the game with one of these characters: Ganzo "Dragon", Tom "Survivor", Garry "Veteran".
Laser sight Unlock requirement: Finish the game with one of these characters: nadia "Tourist", Kati ยซLumberยป, Aika "Stringer".
XXX Unlock requirement: Finish the game with one of these characters: Xavier "Pilot", Rudolf "Jager", Taman "Guard", Greta "Scientist".
